name: userstyles.org ; Red
description:
Ok....I do not want this style to be obsoleted by anyone....Why? Because I didn't copy it!!!! OK? I never did copy anything.............. This style takes the normal Userstyles.org and makes it a cool shade of red. For any reference please say by Exoranger or Kevin Rampling. In any videos you may take with this in it, in the corner, please make a little notation saying: By: Kevin Rampling. Enjoy!
Screenshot
